programme.title: Ireland part 1
programme.desc: Get a glimpse of the Emerald Isle’s unique surf scene through photographer Mark McInnis’ lens.

programme.title: Ireland part 2
programme.desc: With some local help, photographer Mark McInnis and his surfers hunt surf spots well off the beaten path.

programme.title: Lighting the spirit
programme.desc: Photographer Michael Clark and Red Bull Athlete Rafa Ortiz test the new Elinchrom Lightpack to its limits.

programme.title: New challenges
programme.desc: Mick Fanning and Trevor Moran learn that shooting in Norway comes with a unique set of challenges to overcome.

programme.title: Aurora Borealis
programme.desc: Pro surfer Mick Fanning and photographer Trevor Moran arrive in Norway to surf under the Aurora Borealis.

programme.title: La compétition
programme.desc: It's time for the athletes to take on the best surfers in the world at the Quiksilver & Roxy Pro France.

programme.title: Prologue
programme.desc: Get a look at what motivates four of the world's best competitive surfers.

programme.title: The arrival
programme.desc: The surfers arrive in France for the Quiksilver & Roxy Pro.

programme.title: The calm before the storm
programme.desc: As the surfers prepare to travel to their next event in France they reflect on their season so far.

programme.title: The end game
programme.desc: Follow Julian Wilson and Jordy Smith as they look to win more than just the prestigious Pipe Masters trophy.

programme.title: The final preparation
programme.desc: As the 2018 season draws to an end, the athletes spend time with family before the final events of the year.

programme.title: Women’s world title
programme.desc: The WSL Championship Tour has made it to Hawaii for the final two events of the season.

programme.title: ABC of... Breaking
programme.desc: Take a journey through breaking to dive into the dopest moves, hip hop culture and how the dance was born.

programme.title: Plus 27
programme.desc: Jordy Smith shares his journey and the profound impact his homeland has had on his life and surfing career.

programme.title: Morocco
programme.desc: Ashton Goggans guides you through Morocco to discover why it's one of surfing’s fastest growing hotspots.

programme.title: The wave pools promised
programme.desc: This is a dive into the waters of the promise that wave pools would be a pivotal part of surfing’s future.

programme.title: Plus 27
programme.desc: Jordy Smith shares his journey and the profound impact his homeland has had on his life and surfing career.

programme.title: Return of the Lords
programme.desc: Follow the electrifying 2024 event as the world's best breaking crews battled it out in Seattle, USA.

programme.title: ABC of... Climbing
programme.desc: Join Sasha DiGiulian as she takes you on an expedition around the globe with some of the world's top climbers.

programme.title: Barefoot Charles
programme.desc: Barefoot Charles Albert is a minimalist who climbs boulders in Fontainebleau, France, and lives in a cave.

programme.title: Big things to come
programme.desc: Alex Johnson spent a decade trying to climb The Swarm, USA. The challenge forces her to face her true self.

programme.title: Cenote
programme.desc: Adolfo 'Fito' Trujillo’s discovery of climbing in the limestone sinkholes turns the farmer’s life around.

programme.title: Cuddle part 1
programme.desc: Tommy Caldwell and Alex Honnold push their limits when they try to climb 17 alpine summits at high altitude.

programme.title: Cuddle part 2
programme.desc: The missed resupply pushes Tommy and Alex to the limit as they continue their challenge on empty stomachs.

programme.title: This is Beth
programme.desc: An intimate look beneath the success of legendary climber Beth Rodden, diving into her struggles and transformation.
